title: Deployment Strategies (Docker/Cloud)
content:
## Running in the Cloud

Running on your laptop is risky (internet outage, power loss). Cloud VPS is standard.

### Docker

Containerize your bot. Ensures it runs the same everywhere. Simplifies dependency management.

### Cloud Providers

- **AWS (EC2)**: Industry standard. Use 't2.micro' for small bots.
- **DigitalOcean/Vultr**: Simple, cheap VPS.

### Process Management

Use `systemd` or `Supervisor` (or Docker restart policies) to ensure the bot restarts automatically if it crashes.
